attributes.action: SPEND MINOR CRIMINAL RECORD CHECKS AFTER 10 YEARS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IS IT FAIR THAT PEOPLE WITH MINOR CRIMINAL RECORDS FOR SOMETHING STUPID DONE WHEN THEY ARE YOUNG ARE NOW SENT TO EMPLOYERS. THIS IS CAUSING UNEMPLOYMENT AND IS NOT FAIR ESPECIALY WHEN THE CONVICTION IS OVER 30 YEARS OLD.  PEOPLE HAVE BEEN STOPPED DOING  JOBS DONE FOR YEARS FOR 30 YEAR OLD MINOR CONVICTIONS

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
